stories.text:
I’m a backend developer and am looking for a frontend visual workflow library to use for my web app. This library would be used to create the visual workflow to define actions by the user.

Eg customer.io has a drag & drop web workflow to define actions. Pictured at https://customer.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/use-case-upsell.svg

Does anyone know of a frontend library I can use to embed into my web app so that I can tie it into my backend?
stories.title: Ask HN: What open source visual workflow library do you use?
How to Focus in the Age of Distraction

stories.text: Hi, I have one extra ticket that I purchased and won't be able to use. No refunds, only transfers at this point. Is anyone interested? The price now is $349. I'm asking $250 (I also need to pay $50 to transfer the ticket to a new name). If interested please DM me to coordinate.
